remarks: The image of a metric is a metric.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)
statement:
imasf1oxmet.u $e |- ( ph -> U = ( F "s R ) ) $.
imasf1oxmet.v $e |- ( ph -> V = ( Base ` R ) ) $.
imasf1oxmet.f $e |- ( ph -> F : V -1-1-onto-> B ) $.
imasf1oxmet.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Z ) $.
imasf1oxmet.e $e |- E = ( ( dist ` R ) |` ( V X. V ) ) $.
imasf1oxmet.d $e |- D = ( dist ` U ) $.
imasf1omet.m $e |- ( ph -> E e. ( Met ` V ) ) $.
imasf1omet $p |- ( ph -> D e. ( Met ` B ) ) $.
